isis.stitle: POWER STEERING GEAR: SHEPPARD M-SERIES - STEERING SYSTEM DIAGNOSIS - OIL FLOW AND PRESSURE RECOMMENDATIONS

svcproc.title: OIL FLOW AND PRESSURE RECOMMENDATIONS
svcproc.para: Oil flow and pressure for the Sheppard M-Series steering gears are listed by model number in SPECIFICATIONS. Refer to IDENTIFICATION to determine the model of steering gear you are working on. Oil flow requirements remain the same for all similar models and do not change from installation to installation.

Before any steering gear repairs are made, complete the entire Troubleshooting Checklist. Many times steering gears are removed or replaced needlessly. Remember, once the steering gear is removed there is only one thing that can be determined - its weight!!!
